endorsement_to_profile_ratio.description: Ratio of users who have given or received an endorsement
endorsement_to_profile_ratio.action_if_breached: Pause growth, diagnose graph formation failure

organic_share_rate.description: Percentage of active users sharing their profile unprompted per month

repeat_flag_rate.description: Percentage of endorsements being flagged or disputed
repeat_flag_rate.action_if_breached: Investigate coercion, gaming, or UX issues

time_to_first_endorsement.description: Median days from signup to first endorsement given or received

websocket_concurrent_sessions.description: Number of concurrent WebSocket sessions for messaging
websocket_concurrent_sessions.action_if_breached: Begin migration planning to Cloudflare Durable Objects

interaction_exit_rate.description: Percentage of interaction participants who exit after confirmation
interaction_exit_rate.action_if_breached: Investigate coercion, abuse, or consent issues

reports_per_1k_posts.description: Number of content reports per 1,000 timeline posts
reports_per_1k_posts.action_if_breached: Review content safety, tighten rate limits, update moderation flow

median_time_to_first_irl_encounter.description: Median days from signup to first confirmed IRL interaction
median_time_to_first_irl_encounter.action_if_breached: Review encounter UX and contact-to-IRL conversion

irl_encounters_per_active_user.description: Average number of confirmed IRL interactions per active user

pause_mechanism.description: Single config flag to switch from public signup to invite-only
pause_mechanism.emergency_protocol: PM can pause first, explain after if Ari unavailable

ui_visibility.rule: Retractions are never visible in UI
ui_visibility.rationale: Prevents scarlet letter effect, preserves ambiguity

backend_effects: Retraction frequency affects endorser's future signal weight
Feeds into Phase 2 trust calculations as soft negative
Triggers internal review if patterns cluster around single person

future_risk_flag.trigger: Any 'why did my visibility drop?' tooling

tiers.name: monitor
tiers.action: Flag internally, watch for patterns, no intervention

tiers.name: shadow_constrain
tiers.trigger: Second independent signal pointing to same person/yacht
tiers.action: Rate-limit endorsement requests, no notification to user

tiers.name: freeze
tiers.trigger: Three or more independent reports, or concrete evidence
tiers.action: Freeze account endorsement activity, escalate to Ari

high_reputation_handling.ambiguous_violations: One grace period with private warning

allowed_under_pressure: Additional presentation features in Crew Pro
Clearly labeled sponsorships (training providers, gear brands)
forbidden: Payment affecting endorsement visibility, ordering, or weight
Yacht payments before crew monetisation stabilises
Priority dispute resolution for paying users
Any feature interpretable as 'pay to look more trustworthy'

deferred.condition: Only if discovery layer exists and is visibly decoupled from trust weighting

forbidden_features: Any UI that labels absence of endorsements as negative
Contextual benchmarking that feels like scoring

steps: PM makes case in writing, once
PM requests explicit decision from Ari
If overridden, PM documents objection in decision log and executes
If pattern of overrides on constitutional issues, PM escalates directly
If constitutional drift is confirmed and intentional, PM exits

resignation_triggers: Payment influencing endorsement visibility, weight, or eligibility
Yacht payments to suppress or delay negative signals
Any move that makes canonical monetisation rule a lie
